scripts._comment1: All scripts can be ran via `npm run script_name`.
scripts._comment2: The `docker exec` comand is required to run commands to the active playwright docker container.
scripts._comment3: The default given name for the playwright docker container is `pw-cont`.
scripts._comment4: The `xvfb-run` command is required to run headed browsers in a linux container.
scripts._comment5: -g is for grep, can only take one argument
scripts.dcpw: docker exec pw-cont xvfb-run npx playwright
scripts.description: docker exec pw-cont xvfb-run npx playwright test -g
scripts.allureserve: allure generate allure-test-results -o allure-report --clean && allure open allure-report
